# 6.0 Docs

## Version 6.0

- [Duplex contract captures synchronization context](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/wcf-client/6.0/duplex-synchronization-context.md): Learn about the breaking change in WCF Client 6.0 where the DuplexChannelFactory now captures the synchronization context when it's opened.
- [No .NET Standard support](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/wcf-client/6.0/net-standard-2-support.md): Learn about the breaking change in WCF Client 6.0 where it no longer supports .NET Standard 2.0.
